```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_part = sequence[:2]
    middle_part = sequence[2:].replace("0", "", 1)
    last_part = "0" * (len(sequence) - len(sequence.replace("0", "",1)) - 1)
    return first_part + middle_part + last_part
```

```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_part = sequence[:2]
    middle_part = sequence[2:].replace("0", "", 1)
    last_part = "0" * (len(sequence) - len(sequence.replace("0", "",1)) - 1)
    return first_part + middle_part + last_part
```
